instruction: Summarize the synopsis of the movie Avengers: Infinity War.
output: Avengers: Infinity War is an American superhero film based on the Marvel Comics superhero team the Avengers. It is the sequel to 2012's The Avengers and 2015's Avengers: Age of Ultron, and the 19th film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). The film follows the Avengers and their allies as they attempt to prevent Thanos, a villainous alien warlord, from acquiring the Infinity Stones, powerful artifacts that he believes will grant him ultimate power. Along the way, the Avengers are forced to confront their own personal demons and, as a result, must acknowledge the seriousness of the situation and unite in order to save not only the MCU, but also the universe. The film features an ensemble cast of superheroes, including Robert Downey Jr. as Iron Man, Chris Evans as Captain America, Mark Ruffalo as the Hulk, and Josh Brolin as Thanos.
